row.scheme: ;;HelpAllFeatures (d-NewWindow) (if (d-OpenExample "AllFeaturesExplained.denemo") (d-PrintView) (begin (d-WarningDialog "System Example file not found. Check Installation") (d-Close)))
row._tooltip: Opens a score with examples of many things you can create with Denemo with Explanations attached. Click on the explanations in the Print View window.
